TopicTitle: Can someone who goes on the techonce.net forum send the scammer "weliam" my regards?

Articles.Content:
I did a search of my KSP movie today and found this:

http://www.techonce.net/threads/96549-Voyage-a-KSP-film-and-a-thank-you

The user weliam copied my work and pasted it on his forum without asking, and not even with the thought to change its title. The real link is in my signature. This user also has an insane number of posts leading me to believe this user scams all the time. Could someone please send him my regards?

Argh... I hate people like this, trolls copying other people's work and claiming it as theirs, even when its SO OBVIOUS they didn't make it.

Also, shouldn't this be in off topic?
File a DMCA takedown action against the thief.
No don't do that. Just contact him and tell him to stop or else you'll backtrace his IP and call the cyber police.

I don't want to raise doubt about your claim. Looking at your name and avatar both here and on YouTube I am convinced you created those cinematics.

But one point just looks a bit off: You posted your Voyage - a KSP film here on the KSP forum on March 27 (and edited on April 23). He posted the EXACT same text on techonce.net on March 26. One day EARLIER???

I don't want to raise doubt about your claim. Looking at your name and avatar both here and on YouTube I am convinced you created those cinematics.

But one point just looks a bit off: You posted your Voyage - a KSP film here on the KSP forum on March 27 (and edited on April 23). He posted the EXACT same text on techonce.net on March 26. One day EARLIER???

To quote his post:

I put my hard work into a KSP fan works post about a week ago but it went by without anyone looking up

Whoever it was that moved this to the space lounge thanks. Thanks for all the kind words and yes he must have taken it from before I reposted it. Has anyone else had something coppied? I'm pretty frustrated.

http://www.techonce.net/threads/48952-Due-to-my-present-location-on-this-planet

the same item was in the here at one point before it got closed with the same replies

Strangely I don't find any links or video on that page OP linked to.

If it was me, I'd invoke DMCA, it's what it's there for.

If you're feeling nice, contact him and allow him a short amount of time to take it down before you go the nasty route. If I went this route I'd probably want some kind of public apology though.

His age is irrelevant. Tracing his IP is unlikely to help you much, I doubt his ISP cares particularly what he uploads to youtube or wherever as long as he's not DOSing you or something like that.
For reference, this is not single users. The whole forum is scrapings from other forums, with changed names and post dates. The whole site needs a DMCA serving.
